Binary: hwloc, hwloc-nox, libhwloc-dev, libhwloc5, libhwloc-plugins, libhwloc-common, libhwloc-doc
Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 7), cdbs, libltdl-dev, libcairo2-dev, libx11-dev, libxml2-dev, libxml2-utils, libncurses5-dev, libnuma-dev [amd64 arm64 i386 ia64 mips mipsel powerpc ppc64el sparc], libpciaccess-dev, pkg-config, libibverbs-dev [linux-any], ocl-icd-opencl-dev [!hurd-i386], opencl-headers, autoconf (>= 2.63), dh-autoreconf, dpkg-dev (>= 1.16), hardening-wrapper
Package-List: hwloc deb admin extra arch=any hwloc-nox deb admin extra arch=any libhwloc-common deb libs extra arch=all libhwloc-dev deb libdevel extra arch=any libhwloc-doc deb doc extra arch=all libhwloc-plugins deb libs extra arch=any libhwloc5 deb libs extra arch=any
